title: Beulah Land
description: BEULAH LAND.....the tremendously engrossing saga of a great Georgia plantation in its golden age, and of the men and women, white and black, who were born and died there, knew every pain and pleasure, virtue and vice. BEULAH LAND....where the old South as it really was is brought to intense life, in all its outward splendor and secret shame.
author: Lonnie Coleman
